response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents a significant investment but also holds the potential to transform various aspects of your business or personal endeavors.

Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, tailored specifically for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate unparalleled value and innovation.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
